attributes.action: Create a law which constitutes spiking and needling as grievous bodily harm
attributes.additional_details:
This concerning issue started with the emergence of
individuals using methods of needle spiking drugs into female's bodies at nightclubs or house parties. Law-makers should take this concerning issue into account for creating a healthier and safer environment for students and youth population in general.
attributes.background:
The spiking of drinks has become a growing issue in the UK, with a recent survey showing
that one in nine women, and one in seventeen men, have been victims to this cruel and
abusive act (UK Parliament, 2021).

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620554

Decisions on what constitutes Grievous Bodily Harm is a matter for the courts but may already cover instances of needling
